text: @AmandaLeeHouse I had  it ... was worse than any flu I’ve ever had I did have to go on anabiotic’s after I got pneumonia  At around day 10 but the 1st 3 days it was bad ,better when I started drinking hot broth ,later I heard COVID-19 is killed by  hot fluids at nasal pharynx ,where it starts .
